A wearable dog leash with a built-in GPS tracker and panic button, allowing dog owners to keep their pets safe and secure while on walks.
A smart dog leash with a connected app that tracks the dog's activity levels, provides exercise recommendations, and allows owners to monitor their pet's health remotely.
A leash with a built-in water bottle holder, perfect for long hikes or days at the beach, ensuring your furry friend stays hydrated and happy.
A dog leash with a detachable, wearable tag that doubles as a phone case, providing a convenient and stylish way for owners to stay connected while on the go.
A customizable dog leash with interchangeable straps and accessories, allowing owners to personalize their leash to match their pet's unique personality and style.
